sentences.en: Article 12. Grasslands shall be used rationally and overgrazing prevented.
sentences.cn: 第十二条　合理使用草原,防止过量放牧.

sentences.en: Discussion how to use antimicrobial drugs rationally to improve the medical effect.
sentences.cn: 讨论怎样合理应用抗菌药物,提高防治效果.

sentences.en: If emotions made you act rationally, then they wouldn't be called emotions, right?
sentences.cn: 如果情感能使你变得理性呃那就不会叫情感了对 吧 ?

sentences.en: It can be very hard to think rationally when you're feeling so vulnerable and alone.
sentences.cn: 人在脆弱和孤独的时候很难理智地思考。

sentences.en: Large scale revolutions attempting to change all the institutions of society at once make it impossible for anyone –including the revolutionaries –to plan rationally.
sentences.cn: 企图立即改变社会的制度而引发的大规模革命使得所有人都不能理性的计划，包括那些革命者的。

sentences.en: Let's put an end to this dispute and discuss the problem rationally.
sentences.cn: 别再争吵了,让我们大家理智地讨论这一问题吧.

sentences.en: Many sold because they decided, rationally, that they had to.
sentences.cn: 许多人卖出了股票是因为他们理性地决定必须这样做.

sentences.en: Need to design crossover operator rationally while optimizing ANN.
sentences.cn: 优化网络需要合理设计交叉算子.

sentences.en: Neither side would rationally initiate an attack which only result in its own destruction.
sentences.cn: 任何一方只要稍有理性,都不会发动一次结果只能使本身遭到毁灭的袭击.

sentences.en: Principle means rationally understanding contradiction movement end its rule.
sentences.cn: 原则是对矛盾运动及其规律的理性认识.

sentences.en: Second, we protected our resources more effectively and utilized them more rationally.
sentences.cn: 二是加强资源保护和合理利用.

sentences.en: The key to prevent Pseudomembranous colitis is to administrate antibiotics rationally.
sentences.cn: 合理使用抗生素是预防关键.

sentences.en: This wasn't what we had discussed so rationally a few weeks before.
sentences.cn: 这不符合我们几周前提出的经过深思熟虑的寄养条件.

sentences.en: We are determined to set up a complete, rationally distributed scientific and technological research system.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要建成布局合理、相互配套的科研体系.

sentences.en: We should effectively protect, rationally exploit and economize on natural resources.
sentences.cn: 切实保护 、 合理开发和节约使用各种自然资源.

sentences.en: We were very adult about it. We discussed it rationally over a drink.
sentences.cn: 在这件事上我们表现得很成熟。我们一边喝酒一边心平气和地谈了谈。
